questions.question: The ring rolling is widely used in forming:

explanations.a: Pipes are formed using extrusion or rolling.
explanations.b: Piston rings are not the primary product.
explanations.c: Ring rolling is mainly used to produce seamless rings.
explanations.d: Incorrect because seamless rings are produced.

questions.question: The ring rolling process is always advantageous:

explanations.b: Correct, ring rolling is not always advantageous.

questions.question: The main aim of ring rolling is to:

explanations.a: Increase in diameter occurs but is not the primary aim.
explanations.c: Reducing cross-section while increasing diameter is the main aim.
